original_text: Then some of the scribes and Pharisees answered him, saying, “Teacher, we wish to see a sign from you.”
korean_text: 그 때에 서기관과 바리새인 중 몇 사람이 말하되 선생님이여 우리에게 표적 보여주시기를 원하나이다

sentences.original_text: Then some of the scribes and Pharisees answered him, saying,
